
---
title: '低至 239 元：魅族 PANDAER「重塑」斜挎包开启预售'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/9/1bdf0c1d-e72b-4911-bb3d-691654e3fc52.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 25 Jul 2022 14:08:52 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/9/1bdf0c1d-e72b-4911-bb3d-691654e3fc52.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="fff8">魅族 PANDAER「重塑系列」斜挎包今日再次开启预售，零售价 259 元，付定金立减 20 元，实付仅需 239 元：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANkJK1olXDYCVV9cCkoVB2gOHl4lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXwcAUFlbDU4IWipURmtXXW9ZLD8dfygWGRgLGiNNJVlGBjktBEcnBm4AE14SXQEBZF1fD0kRB2oLHGt2OmhYECYoUg98a18IHmtDMwYDVV9cCUsfB2w4G1gSWQQHXF5dDHsXBGsBHV8cXAcFUl5aOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsXM2w4RTUUDgEHBF9bASVKBG5NRR5AB2gEUlZUDU8eA18KGloXXzYy" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BANkJK1olXDYCVV9cCkoVB2gOHl4lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXwcAUFlbDU4IWipURmtuXEN1HQ4jXCtLWy8IWwdSXW1aNkQLBEcnBm4BE1IQXAcGZF1fD0kRB2oLHGt2OmhYECYoUg98a18IHmtDMwYDVV9cCUsfB2w4GVoUXw4FUV1eDnsXBGsBHV8cXAcFUlddOEsfBF9UWQlUHzYyZF1tOHsXM2w4RTUUDg8FAFlaXCVKBG5NRR5CVWgEUlhbCEsXB18KGloXXzYy" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAN4JK1olXDYCVV9cCkoVB2gOHl4lGVlaCgFtUQ5SQi0DBUVNGFJeSwUIFxlJX3EIGloUXwcAUFlbDU4IWipURmsPVBwKKCY_fi4QBDsBewl0Gg90BwYbBEcnBm8JGlkVWgIAUm5eCkwVBWsNGFwlPmFsDholfRFTaAc4GVoWXAcAZAgzCEoWAm4JG1MRXjYCV1lZCkoSBWkMK1sSWQ8EUFdcCUweBm04G1MSbVpABh8fOHsnAF84K1slXjZcOl8OAUxDADgOdQYSXENcEQdeZk0RBWkLH1wXbQQDVVxfOHs" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100030356744">点此查看</a>。</p><p data-vmark="f7e2">PANDAER「重塑」斜挎包采用了 Cordura 面料，YKK 拉链和扣具，进口小牛皮点缀，立体造型引入 PVC 透明可视前袋。该斜挎包的尺寸为 23cm X 8cm X 19cm，在 MESAP 斜挎包的基础上进行了重新设计。</p><p
